alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:41AM AKST until December 27 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible due to slick roads. Additional ice accumulations less than one tenth inch, are expected. Winds gusting to 40 mph could blow trees over onto power lines and cause power outages. * WHERE...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph could blow trees onto power lines and cause power outages. Winds and freezing rain will end this afternoon and conditions will improve then. Cooler temperatures this afternoon will cause water on roads to freeze. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
